name: HexaReaction
description:
A simple and addictive puzzle game!

Touch the hexagon you want the ball to move to, and paint will spread from there! Paint will spread to the adjacent hexagons with the same color, and platforms with bombs will spread the paint to any adjacent hexagon.

Every level has a 'magic' hexagon that'll paint the entire map in one go! try to find it! :)

Download APK file to play on your phone for best experience, but for your convenience we've also uploaded the .exe version :).

Game might be laggy at the start! but it will smooth out quickly.
